mapper.insert: insert into board(title, userid, overview) values (#{title}, #{userId}, #{overview})
mapper.select: select b.board_id, b.title, b.userid, b.regist_time, b.modified_time, b.hit, u.username from board b left join user u on b.userid = u.userid
select b.board_id, b.title, b.userid, b.overview, b.regist_time, b.modified_time, b.hit, u.username from board b left join user u on b.userid = u.userid where b.board_id=#{board_id}
